name: Netigen Kluzowicz
description:
Our company specializes in developing mobile applications on Android and iOS, but we work on Windows Phone too. In our team we have experienced developers, professional graphic designers as well as talented music producers  - we have our own proffesional music studio
So far, we made over 400 applications – games, tools, educational and music programs (available on main distribution channels like Apple App  Store and Google Play); we also worked for many business and nationwide public institutions.  We deliver high quality products with unique design. 
.
